      • allPossibleMoves

        public abstract java.util.List<chess.Move> allPossibleMoves​(chess.Board gameBoard)
        Parameters:
        gameBoard - the current Board that is being used in the game
        Returns:
        List of Moves this will be all possible moves that the piece can make, will not check if it is invalid, i.e doesn't matter if the king will be in check because of this move.
        See Also:
        Move, Board
